oracle.spatial.hadoop.vector.cluster.kmeans

Interface ClusterShapeGenerator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConvexHullClusterShapeGenerator, DummyClusterShapeGenerator

    public interface ClusterShapeGenerator
    Component used to generate a cluster shape in the reduce phase when the cluster center is updated. The expected lifecycle is as follows: setup() //only once per instance clear() //once per cluster addMemberPoint() //once or more times per cluster setClusterCenter() //once per cluster generateShape() //once per cluster
    Author:
    hsaucedo

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMemberPoint(double[] point)
      Adds the point of a cluster member.
      void clear()
      Clears the current status.
      JGeometry generateShape()
      Generates the current cluster shape.
      void setClusterCenter(double[] point)
      Sets the center point of the current cluster
      void setup(Configuration conf)
      Perform initialization tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • addMemberPoint

        void addMemberPoint(double[] point)
        Adds the point of a cluster member. The point reference may be reused so the implemented may need to create a copy.
        Parameters:
        point - point ordinates

      • clear

        void clear()
        Clears the current status. It should be called between cluster shape generation sessions

      • generateShape

        JGeometry generateShape()
        Generates the current cluster shape. The cluster center and the cluster members must have been set previously
        Returns:
        a JGeometry instance

      • setClusterCenter

        void setClusterCenter(double[] point)
        Sets the center point of the current cluster
        Parameters:
        point - point ordinates

      • setup

        void setup(Configuration conf)
        Perform initialization tasks. This method is called only once per instance
        Parameters:
        conf - the job configuration
